comment._content: Meu DEUS esta foto é real???

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_occupation_of_Veracruz has a photo apparently taken at much the same time. That photo has a hand-written caption: "Formal raising of first flag of U.S. / Veracruz 2 P.M. April 27, 1914" Photograph by Hadsell taken during the U.S. occupation of Veracruz, 1914."
